project_name: Terraform and CI/CD for AWS Services
description: This project involved setting up an AWS infrastructure using Terraform and implementing a CI/CD pipeline for automated deployments. The infrastructure included AWS services such as CodePipeline, RDS, VPC, EKS, S3, VPN, and Bastion EC2, with secure connectivity between EKS and RDS.

technologies_used.name: Terraform
technologies_used.description: Automated the setup and management of AWS infrastructure, including services like CodePipeline, RDS, VPC, and EKS.

technologies_used.name: CI/CD
technologies_used.description: Implemented continuous integration and continuous deployment pipelines for seamless application deployment.

technologies_used.name: AWS Services
technologies_used.description: Utilized various AWS services including CodePipeline, RDS, VPC, and Bastion EC2 for a complete cloud-based infrastructure.

technologies_used.name: EKS
technologies_used.description: Deployed and managed containerized applications using Amazon EKS for Kubernetes orchestration.

technologies_used.name: RDS
technologies_used.description: Used Amazon RDS for database management and migrated data to MySQL RDS.

technologies_used.name: VPC
technologies_used.description: Set up a Virtual Private Cloud (VPC) for secure and isolated networking.

technologies_used.name: Automation
technologies_used.description: Automated deployment processes through GitHub Actions and AWS CodePipeline.

infrastructure.name: AWS CodePipeline
infrastructure.description: Configured AWS CodePipeline for continuous integration and deployment.
steps: Automated the build and deployment process from GitHub to EKS.

infrastructure.name: Amazon RDS
infrastructure.description: Set up RDS for database management and migrated existing data.
steps: Migrated data to MySQL RDS and ensured proper configurations.

infrastructure.name: Amazon VPC
infrastructure.description: Configured a VPC for secure networking and resource isolation.
steps: Set up VPC and subnets for EKS and other AWS services.

infrastructure.name: Amazon EKS
infrastructure.description: Managed Kubernetes clusters with Amazon EKS for container orchestration.
steps: Deployed applications to EKS using Docker containers.

infrastructure.name: S3
infrastructure.description: Utilized Amazon S3 for artifact and data storage.
steps: Stored application artifacts and backups in S3.

infrastructure.name: VPN and Bastion EC2
infrastructure.description: Implemented secure connectivity with a VPN and Bastion EC2.
steps: Established secure VPN for communication between EKS and RDS.
